author: Staff Reporter
text:
Selvapuram Police arrested a 33-year-old man for allegedly stabbing a 13-year-old boy with a knife at Chokkampudur on Saturday.

The accused A. Abdul Hakkim (33) of NSK Street in Selvapuram was a head-load worker in Town Hall and worked with the boy’s father N. Anandakumar (37).

The police said that the two men were not in good terms over the last few days. On Saturday, Hakkim had gone to Anandakumar’s house in search of him. Anandakumar's son Pradeep (13) told Hakkim that his father was not at home.

Hakkim allegedly pulled out a knife and stabbed Pradeep.

The Class 7 student was rushed to the Coimbatore Medical College Hospital. According to the police, the boy’s condition was stable. Based on a complaint lodged by Anandakumar, police booked Hakkim under sections 294(B) (uttering obscene words), 324 (voluntarily causing hurt by dangerous weapons or means) and 506 (ii) (criminal intimidation) of the Indian Penal Code and arrested him.
title: Man arrested for stabbing minor boy
